example_sentences.example_en: She bought a newspaper at the kiosk.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle a acheté un journal au kiosque.

example_sentences.example_en: He works at the hospital.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il travaille à l'hôpital.

example_sentences.example_en: The office is on the third floor.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le bureau est au troisième étage.

example_sentences.example_en: They shop at the supermarket every week.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils font leurs courses au supermarché chaque semaine.

example_sentences.example_en: The museum has ancient artifacts.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le musée possède des objets anciens.

example_sentences.example_en: The match is at the stadium.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le match est au stade.

example_sentences.example_en: The lawyer went to court.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'avocat est allé au tribunal.

example_sentences.example_en: She studies at the library.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle étudie à la bibliothèque.

example_sentences.example_en: He buys bread at the bakery.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il achète du pain à la boulangerie.

example_sentences.example_en: The pharmacy is open late.
example_sentences.example_fr: La pharmacie est ouverte tard.

example_sentences.example_en: She went to the bank.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle est allée à la banque.

example_sentences.example_en: He sent a letter from the post office.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a envoyé une lettre du bureau de poste.

example_sentences.example_en: They had dinner at a restaurant.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils ont dîné dans un restaurant.

example_sentences.example_en: She drinks coffee at the cafe.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle boit du café au café.

example_sentences.example_en: He met his friends at the bar.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a retrouvé ses amis au bar.

example_sentences.example_en: They watched a movie at the cinema.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils ont regardé un film au cinéma.

example_sentences.example_en: The children go to school.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants vont à l'école.

example_sentences.example_en: She studies at the university.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle étudie à l'université.

example_sentences.example_en: He reported the theft at the police station.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il a signalé le vol au commissariat de police.

example_sentences.example_en: The fire station is near the park.
example_sentences.example_fr: La caserne de pompiers est près du parc.

example_sentences.example_en: Children play in the park.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants jouent dans le parc.

example_sentences.example_en: The bridge crosses the river.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le pont traverse la rivière.

example_sentences.example_en: The plane landed at the airport.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'avion a atterri à l'aéroport.

example_sentences.example_en: The ship is in the harbor.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le navire est dans le port.

example_sentences.example_en: They visited the zoo.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils ont visité le zoo.

example_sentences.example_en: The swimming pool is open in summer.
example_sentences.example_fr: La piscine est ouverte en été.

example_sentences.example_en: The church is old.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'église est ancienne.

example_sentences.example_en: The mosque is beautiful.
example_sentences.example_fr: La mosquée est belle.

example_sentences.example_en: The temple is peaceful.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le temple est paisible.

example_sentences.example_en: The market is crowded on weekends.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le marché est bondé le week-end.

example_sentences.example_en: They stayed at a hotel.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils ont séjourné dans un hôtel.

example_sentences.example_en: He goes to the gym every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il va à la salle de sport chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: Children play at the playground.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants jouent au terrain de jeu.

example_sentences.example_en: They visited the aquarium on Sunday.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils ont visité l'aquarium dimanche.

example_sentences.example_en: The gallery displays modern art.
example_sentences.example_fr: La galerie expose de l'art moderne.

example_sentences.example_en: The embassy is in the city center.
example_sentences.example_fr: L'ambassade est au centre-ville.

example_sentences.example_en: She waits at the bus stop.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle attend à l'arrêt de bus.

example_sentences.example_en: The parking lot is full.
example_sentences.example_fr: Le parking est plein.

example_sentences.example_en: They went to the shopping mall.
example_sentences.example_fr: Ils sont allés au centre commercial.

example_sentences.example_en: He works in a factory.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il travaille dans une usine.

example_sentences.example_en: The farm has many animals.
example_sentences.example_fr: La ferme a beaucoup d'animaux.
